```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(gganimate)
library(gifski)
climate_data <- read_csv("../datasets/climate_monthly.csv")
```


```{r, include=FALSE}
climate_data %>% 
  filter(Source == "GISTEMP") %>% 
  mutate(year = year(Date),
         month = month(Date))%>%
  ggplot(aes(x=month,y=Mean, color=Mean, group=year))+
  geom_line()+
  coord_polar()+
  scale_x_continuous(limits=c(0,12), breaks=1:12)+
  geom_hline(yintercept=0,color="white",size=2)+
  scale_color_viridis_c(option="E")+
  gganimate::transition_reveal(year)+
  labs(title="Temp im Jahr: {frame_along}")-> Test_anim

animate(Test_anim, fps=3,nframes=137)
```
